channel.title: Shilo Village #459 - Fuck the rest
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/35mp6oo.png[/img]
[b]What we've done (for retards)[/b] Easter event Drawf Cannon (Started by Mikkel) Magic carpet traveling (Started by Mikkel) Random events - every single one done perfectly
[b]What we've done[/b] Redid most of region object loading (was completely retarded to load objects via region times) Configuration interface - I'm sure you've guessed why. Handled more packets: eg. System update packet Fixed near all bugs (such as rune knife range bugs, pest control bugs) Imported the [b]REAL[/b] PJA mapdata while also loading 317 maps (Using 474 left black marks in textures) Fixed all grammatical errors (such as in the dialogues) Cleaned all un-needed comments (such as random comments by Mikkel: "monkeynuts" "penis") Finished player updating (now detects whether user is an npc, object, ect for more features) Null players render fixed (such as log outs, and a player continues to show - how they are not connected) "xLogging" (done with the logout method, instead holds the user (as a null) for 60 seconds if in combat, 10 seconds if not in combat) Removed the binding the client does to the server - therefor useful for webclients and loading the client elsewhere (possibly in other programming languages (eg. VB, C++, C#) NPC updating has been 'patched' (they used to randomly turn into players - another cause of the null player render formations) Custom object loading (before us, the server loaded the objects found ONLY on the maps, we've altered the way it does this, allowing non-regional object loading - uses for custom banks, portals, ect.) Webclient is progressing... we've got it loaded, auto downloads cache, detects directories via operating system (supports all Windows revisions, all Mac revisions, and all Linux revisions and divisions (such as Ubuntu, Fedora, ect.) (does not signal the update server - we need to remove the update server, however this would cause an extreme loss of players because they would need to re-download the client)
[b]Development Team[/b] Myself Haxifix [s]Scape-JAVA[/s] doosh Berky Scully Arkadian (Used to be JohnnyJ)
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/apgw8i.png[/img]

item.title: Shilo Village #459 - Fuck the rest
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[center]

What we’ve done (for retards)
Easter event
Drawf Cannon (Started by Mikkel)
Magic carpet traveling (Started by Mikkel)
Random events - every single one done perfectly

What we’ve done
Redid most of region object loading (was completely retarded to load objects via region times)
Configuration interface - I’m sure you’ve guessed why.
Handled more packets: eg. System update packet
Fixed near all bugs (such as rune knife range bugs, pest control bugs)
Imported the REAL PJA mapdata while also loading 317 maps (Using 474 left black marks in textures)
Fixed all grammatical errors (such as in the dialogues)
Cleaned all un-needed comments (such as random comments by Mikkel: “monkeynuts” “penis”)
Finished player updating (now detects whether user is an npc, object, ect for more features)
Null players render fixed (such as log outs, and a player continues to show - how they are not connected)
“xLogging” (done with the logout method, instead holds the user (as a null) for 60 seconds if in combat, 10 seconds if not in combat)
Removed the binding the client does to the server - therefor useful for webclients and loading the client elsewhere (possibly in other programming languages (eg. VB, C++, C#)
NPC updating has been ‘patched’ (they used to randomly turn into players - another cause of the null player render formations)
Custom object loading (before us, the server loaded the objects found ONLY on the maps, we’ve altered the way it does this, allowing non-regional object loading - uses for custom banks, portals, ect.)
Webclient is progressing… we’ve got it loaded, auto downloads cache, detects directories via operating system (supports all Windows revisions, all Mac revisions, and all Linux revisions and divisions (such as Ubuntu, Fedora, ect.) (does not signal the update server - we need to remove the update server, however this would cause an extreme loss of players because they would need to re-download the client)

Development Team
Myself
Haxifix
Scape-JAVA doosh
Berky
Scully
Arkadian (Used to be JohnnyJ)


[/center]

Read full topic
